@jeddac wrote:

Note : stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API.
Note : recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details.
Finished!
Press any key to continue…

item.title: Compiler fails
item.dc:creator: @K-style K-style
item.description:
@K-style wrote:

Here is a very useful and good compiler:

@echo off if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error) :compile for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe") if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java) if defined p (goto end) :error echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load. "%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe" http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp :end echo Finished! pause exit
[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 21, 2009, 05:54:58 pm[/size][hr][quote=“K-style, post:2, topic:296745”]Look here: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,349078.0.html

There are many diferent compilers and you can try. XD[/quote]

Also look in that link i posted.

Read full topic

item.title: Compiler fails
item.dc:creator: @K-style K-style
item.description:
@K-style wrote:

Ugh, your serious? Look use this.:

@echo off color 0a title jeddac Compiler if exist "c:\Program Files\Java\jdk.1.6.0_14" (call :compile "C:/Program Files/Java/jdk.1.6.0_14") else (goto error) :compile for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe") if defined p (%p% -cp . *.javac) if defined p (goto end) :error echo You do not have Java installed. :end echo You have sucsessfully compiled pause exit

Read full topic

item.title: Compiler fails
item.dc:creator: @ziplock ziplock
item.description:
@ziplock wrote:

[quote=“jeddac, post:1, topic:296745”]@echo off
color 0a
title Unlimited-pkz Compiler
if exist “c:\Program Files\Java\jdk.1.6.0_14” (call :compile “C:/Program Files/Java/jdk.1.6.0_14”) else (goto error)
:compile
for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe")
if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java)
if defined p (goto end)
:error
echo You do not have Java installed.
:end
echo You have sucsessfully compiled
pause
exit

Keeps saying i don’t have jdk? anyone could help?[/quote]

javac

Read full topic

item.title: Compiler fails
item.dc:creator: @jeddac jeddac
item.description:
@jeddac wrote:

@echo off
color 0a
title Unlimited-pkz Compiler
if exist “c:\Program Files\Java\jdk.1.6.0_14” (call :compile “C:/Program Files/Java/jdk.1.6.0_14”) else (goto error)
:compile
for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe")
if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java)
if defined p (goto end)
:error
echo You do not have Java installed.
:end
echo You have sucsessfully compiled
pause
exit

Keeps saying i don’t have jdk? anyone could help?

Read full topic
